title: Episode 115: Feat. D.L. Hughley
itunes:title: Episode 115: Feat. D.L. Hughley
description:
D.L. Hughley sits with the ladies of Lip Service and shares a wide range of stories from his life. Some stories will touch your heart, others will make you cringe. D.L. reveals he was consensually molested at the age of 13, the time he saved a girl from being raped, an instance in which he got into an with altercation with Bill Cosby, and MUCH more. Enjoy!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
